xten.name: navbar
xten.initElement:
<%
        var collapseWidth = element.getAttribute('collapase-width');
        if (collapseWidth) {
            collapseWidth = parseInt(collapseWidth.replace(/px$/, ''));
            window.addEventListener('resize', (event) => {
                if (window.innerWidth < collapseWidth) {
                    wxfns.addClass(element, 'collapse');
                }
                else
                {
                    wxfns.removeClass(element, 'collapse');
                }
            });
        }
    %>

xten.name: navitem

event.name: click
event.code:
<%
                event.preventDefault();
                element = event.target;
                const href = element.getAttribute('href');
                if (href && href != '#') {
                    window.location.href = href;
                }
            %>
